title: $2500 two bedrooms, 1400, 47 Avenue, apt 3, SF CA 94122
posting_body: Adress:
1400, 47 Avenue, apt 3, SF, CA 94122, at corner of Judah Street
Nice neighborhood Sunset/Parkside, near Ocean Beach, Great Highway, Golden Gate Park
with beautiful sunset view and outdoor activities
OPEN HOUSE dates and time:
August 6, 7,  13, 14, each day 2 p.m. to 4 p.m.
Details of this apartment:
Two bright bedrooms with new curtains, walk-in closets, wood floor through out
Spacious living room, wood floor, big windows with sunset warmth
Huge eat-in kitchen, granite counter top, lots of cabinets, electric stove, refrigerator
Bathroom with shower over bath tub
No dishwasher, No laundry in the building, laundry in one block
Easy transportation, N Judah street car to South of Market, Mission Bay, UCSF, General Hospital, Kaiser Hospital, Bart, Ferry, Train
Buses #18, #29, #5 to UCSF, SF State U, USF, City College, Art Institue, Trader's Joe, Stonestown Galleria
Close to Safeway, 7 Eleven, restaurants, cafe, coffee shops, laundry
Rent $2500 per month, one year lease
Deposit $2800
Tenant pays all utilities
No pet, No dog, No cat, No smoking
Available now, move in condition
